column4: hello all. i have a program running(converting a vmware disk image to virtualbox image) and sfce just geeked out and i need to log out then back in...but i am running the converter program in a console and im wondering how i can switch it to the background...so i can log out and it will stay running
how can i force a program to run in the background? its currently running in a console?
one way is to start the process with "nohup"
see the program is already running..and i need to log out then back in...without it stopping
